Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard/Overland Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Eidenhoft Boulevard and Overland Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Eidenhoft Boulevard takes a turn towards the southwest at this intersection. The turn looks a little odd, considering how well the other streets in the city are laid out, but if it continued to the south it would run into the Ogden Family Villa. The Ogden family, being one of the richest and most influential in Oceancrest, paid the city to make the road go around their house instead of having to move. Overland Drive heads east and west, and eventually passes by what most people believe to be a haunted house.
